description: Main navigation header with Home, About, Pricing, Contact Us links that allows users to navigate between all main sections of the website
steps: Load homepage and verify header displays with forest green background
Click each navigation link (Home, About, Pricing, Contact Us)
Verify each link navigates to correct page/section
Verify navigation remains visible and functional on all pages

description: Welcome section with cognac brown background displaying main headline 'Taking Your Business to the Next Level' and descriptive text about social media services
steps: Load homepage and verify hero section displays with cognac brown background
Verify headline text appears on right side using CA SMUT font
Verify descriptive text appears on left side using CA SMUT FULL font
Verify logo displays in center and moves to back when overlapping text

description: Small logo that appears in center of header when user starts scrolling down from the top of the page
steps: Load homepage at top position
Scroll down slowly and observe header area
Verify small logo appears in center of header during scroll
Scroll back to top and verify logo disappears

description: Services section with ivory background explaining 'How our services work' with 4 service steps: Research, Script, Film & Edit, Upload
steps: Navigate to services section on homepage
Verify section displays with ivory/cream background
Verify 'How our services work' heading displays prominently
Verify all 4 service steps are visible with proper icons and descriptions

description: Research service card showing magnifying glass icon and description about finding highest performing content creators in user's niche
steps: Navigate to services section
Locate Research service card
Verify magnifying glass icon displays correctly
Verify description text explains research process for content creators

description: Script service card showing document icon and description about creating full month's worth of scripts using research and business information
steps: Navigate to services section
Locate Script service card
Verify document/script icon displays correctly
Verify description explains monthly script creation process

description: Film & Edit service card showing video camera icon and description about client filming videos and agency editing them
steps: Navigate to services section
Locate Film & Edit service card
Verify video camera icon displays correctly
Verify description explains filming and editing process division

description: Upload service card showing upload icon and description about optimized content uploading across multiple social media platforms
steps: Navigate to services section
Locate Upload service card
Verify upload icon displays correctly
Verify description mentions Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, YouTube, LinkedIn platforms

description: Button in services section that navigates users to the About page to learn more about what the agency does
steps: Navigate to services section on homepage
Locate 'learn more about what we do' button
Click the button
Verify navigation to About page occurs

description: Button in services section that navigates users to the Pricing page to learn about service costs
steps: Navigate to services section on homepage
Locate 'learn more about our pricing' button
Click the button
Verify navigation to Pricing page occurs

description: FAQ section displaying 8 frequently asked questions with collapsible/expandable answers to keep page length manageable
steps: Navigate to FAQ section on homepage
Verify all 8 FAQ questions are visible
Verify answers are initially collapsed/hidden
Click on each question to verify answers expand and collapse properly

description: Interactive functionality allowing users to click FAQ questions to expand/collapse detailed answers
steps: Navigate to FAQ section
Click on first FAQ question
Verify answer expands and displays full content
Click question again to verify answer collapses

description: Footer section with burgundy background containing social media icons and contact email contact@cinebih.com
steps: Scroll to bottom of homepage
Verify footer displays with burgundy background
Verify social media icons are present
Verify contact email contact@cinebih.com is displayed

description: Social media icons in footer that will link to agency's social media profiles (links to be added later)
steps: Navigate to footer section
Verify all major social media icons are present
Verify icons are properly styled and visible
Verify icons are clickable (even if links not yet active)

description: Dedicated About page accessible via main navigation and service section buttons
steps: Click About link in main navigation
Verify About page loads correctly
Navigate back to homepage and click 'learn more about what we do' button
Verify same About page loads

description: Our Story section on About page explaining agency founding principles and mission to help businesses with content creation
steps: Navigate to About page
Locate Our Story section
Verify section explains agency founding principles
Verify content covers business growth challenges and agency solutions

description: Detailed services section on About page explaining Research, Script, Film & Edit, and Upload processes with expanded descriptions
steps: Navigate to About page services section
Verify Research subsection with detailed explanation
Verify Script subsection with detailed explanation
Verify Film & Edit and Upload subsections with detailed explanations

description: Detailed Research section explaining 10-15 hours of brand research, pattern analysis, and 2-4 week update cycles
steps: Navigate to About page Research section
Verify explanation of 3-4 second user attention span
Verify mention of 10-15 hours research commitment
Verify explanation of 2-4 week research update cycles

description: Detailed Script section explaining monthly content planning, consistency importance, and tailored business scripting
steps: Navigate to About page Script section
Verify explanation of monthly video scripting
Verify emphasis on consistency for social media growth
Verify mention of tailored business-specific content

description: Detailed Film & Edit section explaining cost-effective phone filming and comprehensive editing services including subtitles and color grading
steps: Navigate to About page Film & Edit section
Verify explanation of phone filming capabilities
Verify mention of 1080p 30fps social media requirements
Verify editing services list including subtitles and color-grading

description: Detailed Upload section explaining platform-specific optimization for TikTok, Instagram, YouTube Shorts, and LinkedIn algorithms
steps: Navigate to About page Upload section
Verify explanation of platform-specific algorithms
Verify mention of TikTok, Instagram, YouTube Shorts, LinkedIn
Verify emphasis on optimized posting for each platform

description: Book Now button on About page that allows interested users to initiate contact or booking process
steps: Navigate to About page
Locate Book Now button
Verify button is prominently displayed
Click button to verify it initiates contact/booking process

description: Dedicated Pricing page accessible via main navigation and service section buttons
steps: Click Pricing link in main navigation
Verify Pricing page loads correctly
Navigate back to homepage and click 'learn more about our pricing' button
Verify same Pricing page loads

description: Pricing justification section explaining team expertise, research, scripting, editing, and social media management value
steps: Navigate to Pricing page
Locate cost explanation section
Verify explanation covers team expertise and services
Verify emphasis on full creative team value proposition

description: Starter plan display showing 15 shorts/month for €1950/month with full service list and Book Now button
steps: Navigate to Pricing page
Locate Starter plan section
Verify 15 shorts/month and €1950/month pricing
Verify complete service list and Book Now button are present

description: Optimise plan display showing 20 shorts/month for €2495/month with full service list and Book Now button
steps: Navigate to Pricing page
Locate Optimise plan section
Verify 20 shorts/month and €2495/month pricing
Verify complete service list and Book Now button are present

description: Dominate plan display showing 30 shorts/month for €3395/month with full service list and Book Now button
steps: Navigate to Pricing page
Locate Dominate plan section
Verify 30 shorts/month and €3395/month pricing
Verify complete service list and Book Now button are present
errorMessage: Agent completed but feature not marked as passed

description: Detailed feature list for each pricing plan including onboarding calls, research, scripting, editing, uploading, Instagram stories, email support, and monthly reports
steps: Navigate to each pricing plan
Verify Onboarding/Review Calls feature listed
Verify Research, Scripting, Editing, Uploading features listed
Verify Instagram Stories, Email Support, Monthly Reports, and Profile Optimization bonus listed

description: Book Now buttons on each pricing plan that initiate the booking/contact process for that specific plan
steps: Navigate to Pricing page
Click Book Now button on Starter plan
Verify booking process initiates with Starter plan context
Repeat for Optimise and Dominate plans

description: Dedicated Contact Us page accessible via main navigation
steps: Click Contact Us link in main navigation
Verify Contact page loads correctly
Verify page displays contact form or information
Verify page maintains consistent styling with rest of site
errorMessage: Agent completed but feature not marked as passed

description: Basic contact form allowing users to submit inquiries with standard contact fields
steps: Navigate to Contact Us page
Verify contact form is displayed
Verify form contains appropriate input fields
Verify form has submit button

description: Functional contact form that accepts user input and processes form submissions
steps: Navigate to Contact Us page
Fill out all required form fields
Click submit button
Verify form submission processes successfully with confirmation message

description: Mobile-responsive design ensuring all pages and features work properly on mobile devices and tablets
steps: Access website on mobile device or resize browser to mobile width
Navigate through all pages (Home, About, Pricing, Contact)
Verify all content displays properly and remains readable
Verify all buttons and navigation work on mobile

description: Consistent implementation of retro poster color palette across all pages including forest green headers, cognac brown hero, ivory services, burgundy footer, and antique gold accents
steps: Navigate through all website pages
Verify header uses deep forest green (#014421)
Verify hero section uses cognac brown (#8B5E3C)
Verify services section uses ivory/cream (#F8F4E3) and footer uses burgundy (#581845)

description: Consistent use of CA SMUT and CA SMUT FULL fonts throughout the website as specified in design requirements
steps: Navigate through all website pages
Verify headings use CA SMUT font
Verify body text uses CA SMUT FULL font
Verify font rendering is consistent across different browsers
